body_html:
I don't think there is a good reason for the target to be private, can be made public.
If you'd like to send in a pull request, we'd be happy to merge it.

(Out of curiosity: From your notes above, I gather that your project is also using bazel and you're using tensorflow as an external dependency?)

body:
I don't think there is a good reason for the target to be private, can be made public.
If you'd like to send in a pull request, we'd be happy to merge it.

(Out of curiosity: From your notes above, I gather that your project is also using bazel and you're using tensorflow as an external dependency?)
